img_above_text:
![Snow Fox Questline \(69\).png](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/d/d9/Snow_Fox_Questline_%2869%29.png)
To counter this, you want to get him to stay still as often as possible. So for this fight, you'll need to be quite aggressive to try and interrupt the flow of his attacks and keep him stunned for as long as you can.
img_below_text:
Use Spirits that can deliver heavy hits like Wandering Wight. If you can land the head-smashing Faithful Kowtow move on him, you can knock him completely over. This will stagger him for a moment, giving you the chance to move in quickly to follow up with combos.
Team this spells like a Pluck of Many to overwhelm him, and transformations. Azure Dust is good if you can keep him pinned, so you can continue with the heavy attacks and build Might for a finisher while doing so. Alternatively, Red Tides works due to the quick nature of the attacks, and the ability to inflict burn damage.
summary_promot:
You are shown an image extracted from a video game walkthrough or guide.


        
        Context:
        - Preceding Text: "![Snow Fox Questline \(69\).png](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/d/d9/Snow_Fox_Questline_%2869%29.png)
To counter this, you want to get him to stay still as often as possible. So for this fight, you'll need to be quite aggressive to try and interrupt the flow of his attacks and keep him stunned for as long as you can."
        - Following Text: "Use Spirits that can deliver heavy hits like Wandering Wight. If you can land the head-smashing Faithful Kowtow move on him, you can knock him completely over. This will stagger him for a moment, giving you the chance to move in quickly to follow up with combos.
Team this spells like a Pluck of Many to overwhelm him, and transformations. Azure Dust is good if you can keep him pinned, so you can continue with the heavy attacks and build Might for a finisher while doing so. Alternatively, Red Tides works due to the quick nature of the attacks, and the ability to inflict burn damage."

        Your task:
        1. Generate a **short, clear, and informative English summary** of the image.
        2. Focus primarily on the **preceding and following text** to infer the image's **purpose, content, or narrative role**.
        3. Do **not** speculate beyond the visible content.
img_summary: The image depicts an intense combat scene from the video game *Black Myth: Wukong*, showing the player character engaging in a fight with a horned enemy named "Non-Void." Sparks and motion effects indicate an attack or impact, suggesting the use of aggressive tactics to stagger the enemy. The preceding and following text provides strategies for this encounter, emphasizing heavy-hitting moves, stuns, and quick follow-up attacks to exploit the enemy's vulnerabilities.
